descriptionHtml:
Sorry for my bad english.

This mod changes the Fast-Sneak-Animation to an Catlike-4th-feet-Animation. 
You can see it like an travel-mode, it works perfect with any Fast-Travel-Block-Mod.

Your Fast-Sneak-Mode is faster than Sprinting and do\'t cost stamina.  But your slow-Sneak-Animation & speed stay untouched.

This mod also change the jump-height to make momo\'s Acrobatic jump more realistic.

Installation:

Install at first:
pc exclusive animation path with all Required mods (FNIS i think)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14871

than install:
Momo Acrobatic Jump Animation
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16864

at last download:
khajiit cat dash
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22604

take this file (mt_sprintforward.hkx (only this file)), place it on maybe your desktop and name it: \"sneakrun_forward.hkx\" (without \"\"). than place this file to:
\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\"

at last download my mod and past it in your Data-Folder

finish. 

sorry, the last step is a little bit tricky, but i don\'t know if i can upload 0r080r0\'s animation-file in my mod^^

I hope you like this mod, it was originally only for personal use but i decide to upload this mod for all Khajiit oder Neko-Players xD
author: Rikushai
